title: Lux needs a new SKIN
body: It has been toooo long after last lux skin came out!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EnZFjOw4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-12T06:39:47.793+0000)
>
> This.
> 
> Pool Party {{champion:154}} anyone?

what would happen to renekton then? till zac gets buffs I will not accept it

I don't know why people are suggesting champions like Swain, Zac, Diana, Aatrox, Reksai, Yasuo get new skins, when we could certainly use more for champions like Ahri, TF, Maokai, Teemo, Lee Sin, Katarina, Riven, Lux...
 it is absolutely appalling really.
